name: Patryk Zaslawski

Proficient in **Terraform**, **Ansible**, **Puppet**, **AWS**, **GCP**, **Azure**, and **Linux**, I excel in automating and optimizing workflows to enhance operational efficiency. With a focus on infrastructure as code and continuous integration/deployment using **Jenkins**, I am committed to delivering scalable and reliable solutions aligned with business objectives.
